title: Games a joke
body:
Still no one addressed my mmr question....Noticed if you don't spend money on this game weekly you get nothing but losses...

How can someone get banned for getting boosted to plat 5 account reset go 6-4 in placements receive gold one to the guy that goes 10-0 in placements receives the same rank. 

I spent 40 bucks on this game won literally 11 games in a row then now I cant win maybe because I haven't bought rp a couple days after...

How can my mmr be lower then the actual rank I am at if I have almost 10 wins over losses....

This game is an utter joke... It's depressing haven't even seen a new player enter the competitive scene unless you count biofrost who is utter trash yet made it to the pro circuit....Ahhh connections connections connections.

replies.body: This is about the stupidest and most easily disproved conspiracy theory i have seen recently.

I dont feel like feeding the trolls. Anything i say will just make you cry harder. If the 2016 election taught us anything, it is that you cant win a logical debate with the the stupid, the irresponsible or the extremely gullible.

TL;DR is that there is zero evidence for this, it would show up as very obvious data, considering the outcome of every game is publicly recorded by various sites using the API, it would be clear and obvious by now. Your personal experience with a tiny sample size means exactly nothing.

There is also no logical reason for it? Why would riot do this and then make it secret?
If nobody "knows about it", it would not help them make any money, and serves absolutely no purpose for them or the community.

It looks like you just want an excuse for loosing.

I will not bother replying to whatever stupidity you vomit up to deny this, because there is nothing else to say. Deny if you want, nobody else cares how deluded you are.

You will be playing with people in plat if you were plat before and if you win you will easily climb out of gold in a couple dozen games (assuming you don't just flat out skip certain divisions)
